body_content.explanation: abbreviation for compensatory time off: time that an employee who has worked extra hours may take off from work instead of being paid for the extra hours:
examples: CTO agreements allow certain employees to voluntarily select overtime compensation in the form of time off.

body_content.explanation: abbreviation for chief technology officer: someone with a high position in a business who is responsible for technical and scientific issues:
examples: He served as the CTO of Ingredients.com before launching his own e-business consultancy.
